title: Mabeob Chunjamun (Magic Han War)
synopsis: Born from within the magical character stones, Oki grew up around the ancient mountain monkeys until one day, he left to collect all of the magic character stones scattered throughout the world. During his journey, he meets Bori, a master in the arts of the magical character stones and together, they set off on a journey to train in the ancient arts of character magic.
related_anime: ['Mabeob Chunjamun Season 2', 'Mabeob Chunjamun: Daemawang-ui Buhwal-eul Mag-ala', 'Mabeop Cheonjamun']
